answers.a: An equivalent current source in parallel with an equivalent impedance

question: If two identical 3A, 4Ω Norton equivalent circuits are connected in parallel with like polarity, the combined Norton equivalent circuit will be

Which of the following circuits is/are correct about Norton’s theorem. i. The value of current source is the short circuit current between the two output terminals of the network. ii. Resistance is the equivalent resistance measured between the load terminals of the network. Sources are replaced by their internal resistance.

answers.c: Both i and ii are correct.
